product_description: These soft tie-waist pants are crafted from a blend of rich silk and organic cotton that gives them an elevated look and feel.
product_details_and_care:
These soft tie-waist pants are crafted from a blend of rich silk and organic cotton that gives them an elevated look and feel.
24" inseam; 18" leg opening; 15" front rise; 20 1/2" back rise (size 3X)
Elastic/drawstring waist
72% silk, 28% organic cotton
Hand wash, dry flat
Imported
Women's Clothing
Item #6069157
product_size_info:
Runs large; if between sizes, order one size down.
1X=16W-18W, 2X=20W-22W, 3X=24W.
High rise.
